course.title: MAT 4154 Introduction to Algebraic Geometry (3 units)
course.desc: Brief overview of commutative algebra, Hilbert's Nullstellensatz, algebraic sets, and Zariski topology. Affine and projective varieties over algebraically closed fields. Regular functions and rational maps. Additional topics chosen from: the relation of varieties over complex numbers to complex analytic manifolds, genus, divisors, line bundles, Riemann-Roch Theorem, Bézout's Theorem.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: MAT 3143.
